name: rpg
prompt: Create a turn-based RPG battle demo. The player controls a hero fighting a monster. Implement a menu system with Attack, Magic, Defend, and Flee options. Show HP/MP bars for the hero and HP for the monster. Use a state machine for turn-based combat flow.
description: Turn-based RPG battle demonstrating menu systems, state machines, and stat management
techniques: State machine for battle flow (MENU, PLAYER_TURN, ENEMY_TURN, etc.)
Menu navigation with D-pad (2x2 grid layout)
HP/MP bar rendering with filled/empty tiles
Damage calculation with attack, defense, and variance
